title: Virtual Library-Utilized Mathematics Education Leadership Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and adaptability to online learning environments
context.additional_context: A short-term course for corporate education managers/leaders to learn how to utilize a virtual library system for mathematics job training. Strengthening teaching presence to implement an interaction-centered online learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for and utilize mathematics education resources (papers, datasets, e-books) using a virtual library system.
Learners can apply Teaching Presence in online environments to implement strategies for inducing learner engagement and interaction.
Learners can propose methods to assess and improve information literacy competencies required for mathematics education leadership.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
